Success Stories

There have been so many success stories over the years. Every saved chihuahua is a precious friend to one person or one family. These are some wonderful examples of lifelong friendships that changed the life of both the human and the chihuahua who were lucky enough to be brought together by CRT. We hope to have many more future success stories to share.

Lily and the Johnson Family
